channel.title: Crobar Insane Design India on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Crobar Insane Design India on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: jumpin jumpin
item.description: tonight I am going to dinner with morgan. it is kinda weird. I haven’t seen her since we broke up. I am a bit apprenhensive - not really about seeing her. just about the whole situation. it is kinda scary. haha. I am glad, however that it is scary by design and not scary or uncomfortable because I happened to run in to her randomly. we have been talking on email - so it shoudln’t be too uncomfortable.
